__e: Which is why you were so angry when I gave it to Mrs Hughes.
Mrs Hughes said we all have lives to lead, but that isn't true.
Dear Mrs Hughes, I hope you've had some time to yourself while we've been away.
I'm sorry for what we've put you through, Mrs Bates.
I... said... I hoped his trip to London was to do with some property he owned. And not to do with the former Mrs Bates.
I'm really only here to talk to Mrs Bates about her new evidence.
